column1: Little Goat Diner////I am a huge fan of Little Goat and came here a ton when it first opened as Stephanie Izard is one of my favorite Chicago chefs
column2: never realized I never wrote a review -- but I've tried plenty of the items such as the brendade and pork belly
column6: sloppy goat and many others (that may have since rotated off the menu?). I love the atmosphere of this place
column8: very approachable and casual. Sometimes there's a wait
column9: but usually it's bearable as they have a lot of seating.
